New Records: James Harden recorded 15 assists in the first half, matching the highest by a Clippers player since the 1996-97 season
Key Match Events: The Clippers had a 27-4 run in the second quarter, turning the game in their favor
Kawhi Leonard returned from a right knee injury and scored 12 points
Pre-Game Insights: Kawhi Leonard missed the first 34 games due to right knee injury recovery
Post-Match Reflections: The Clippers snapped a two-game losing streak with the victory
The Atlanta Hawks have dropped their last three games after a four-game winning streak
Miscellaneous Highlights: Trae Young led the Atlanta Hawks with 20 points and 14 assists
Terance Mann returned to the lineup and scored 12 points in 16 minutes
